metadata.name: Namespace naming best practice
metadata.description: Checks for namespace name to follow best practice of avoiding names starting with 'kube-' , since it is reserved for Kubernetes system namespaces

metadata.name: KenDRule1
metadata.description: This is a basic Rule that uses a template

metadata.name: kube-apiserver
metadata.description: trying to check kube-apiserver args are set properly

metadata.name: Resource owner label
metadata.description: Checks a label for resource owner exist

metadata.name: Pod availability
metadata.description: Avoid running naked pod(that is, Pods not bound to a ReplicaSet or Deployment) ,naked pods will not be rescheduled in the event of a node failure. Run more than one replica of pod for high availability and less downtime

metadata.name: Node affinity
metadata.description: Use nodeAffinity and set "hard"/"soft" compulsion on preferred node to get control on scheduling of pods

metadata.name: kube-apiserver anonymous auth disabled
metadata.description: kube-api server arg --anonymous-auth must be set false

metadata.name: livenessProbe and readinessProbe check
metadata.description: Liveness and readiness probes help manage a pod’s lifecycle during deployments, restarts, and upgrades. If these checks are not properly configured, pods may be terminated while initializing

metadata.name: Container belongs to PD's Harbor instance
CSG - Malware Identified
metadata.description: Custom rule to detect malware within an environment

metadata.name: Secret Data best practice
metadata.description: Checks secret data is not present as plain string in configuration file

metadata.name: High Vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Detect images with high vulnerabilities or more

metadata.name: medium-severity
metadata.description: Prevents deployment of images with medium vulnerabilities in OS packages or libraries

metadata.name: Auditing
metadata.description:
Activate audit logging - Ensure that local logging has been enabled on all systems and networking devices.

CIS - 3.2.1 Ensure that a minimal audit policy is created

metadata.name: Get-Metadata-Name
metadata.description: Pull the metadata name of the container

metadata.name: Use custom namespaces
metadata.description: Use non-default and non-kubernetes administered namespaces for general workloads to achieve isolation and avoid confusion

metadata.name: Approved Registries
metadata.description: Only Docker Hub, GCR  and Harbor
Avoid using the :latest tag when deploying containers in production as it is harder to track which version of the image is running and more difficult to roll back properly

Minimum CPU request
metadata.description: Be sure that all container has a minimum of 1 pod request

metadata.name: Image Blocker
metadata.description: Block container image from being deployed

metadata.name: Registry limitation
metadata.description: Limit registry to avoid Docker Hub and 2M images with critical vulnerabilities
